title: brand new computer runs great but not league
body: I have a new gaming computer built and everything works fine even other games which i have played, but after i get through the champion select screen league takes much longer than it should to start connecting me to the game loading screen. help?

replies.body:
Loading times can be affected by a number of factors. Disk speed, system permissions, and connection strength to the servers are the biggest contributing factors to how long it takes to enter the match loading screen. A good place to start would be our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), which includes quick and simple solutions if this is caused by missing system permissions.

Let me know if you still encounter this issue after working through that guide.
Uhh i've done as the permissions guide has told but i believe it is still slower than what it should be considering how my older weaker computer loads up faster than mine does.

Interesting. Well, since you're still seeing issues, I suggest reaching out to our tech crew by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) will ensure they have all the context necessary to properly address this problem. 

Let me know if you have additional questions.
